title.narrative: World of Weaving - The beauty of handwoven

description.narrative: The mission of World of Weaving ?WOW'is to improve the economic social and cultural well being of women weavers by giving them training in contemporary home textile designs and connecting their products to the global market place. Overall objectives of thi s project is to enhance professionalism and pride in the textile industry by bringing Tanzanian weaving designs to the world market; to improve social cultural and economic growth in rural and urban Tanzania through weaving design and to improve the image of Tanzania's weaving textile industry. Specific objectives include to develop the capacity of women weavers tailors and production line managers in modern home and textile designs. target group include 14 women weavers from Ifakara in Morogoro Region and Dar es Salaam City; 2 production line managers; 2 tailors; 2 dyes persons however final beneficiaries will more than 500 people from the rural and urban communities of Morogoro and Dar. The final results of the activities will be to get highly skilled wome n weavers tailors and managers with improved social cultural and economic wellbeing; a production of high quality home and fashion designs for WOW that will reach national and international markets also research and training in sourcing organic cotton in T anzania use of natural dye and fair trade certification.
